channel.title: Portforwarding
channel.description: Ok, i've done everything to host my own server. Except porforwarding, I went to porforward.com and clicked on Guides then I clicked on "Portforwarding Guides By Router" Now, theres alot of different games and programs. I'd like to know what one I click so I can set up portforwarding, and host my server to others. I have wireless internet, and My wireless adapter is Netopia, but the base router is Westell, which we can wirelessly conenct to. So Would I click on Netopia or westell?

item.title: Portforwarding
item.dc:creator: @Elvemage_0o Elvemage 0o
item.description:
@Elvemage_0o wrote:

thats just a guide

the best way to portforward is log into your router by opening up a web browser page and typing in

192.168.1.1

there will be a box asking for username and pass

by default username is admin and pass is password

ok now your in your router

now look around for applications and gaming

make a new app (title it (RSPS) and put port start :43594 port end : 43594

and port mapping : 43594 make sure tcp is checked and press ok

and now go back to app page and then click RSPS

when your logging into your server make sure u put as your ip 0.0.0.0

noyl other players use the ip that ur hosting

u use 0.0.0.0

thanks

Read full topic
